ModMetaData.name: TT-15 - Scorpion Mechanoid - Translation
ModMetaData.author: XxHyde840xX
ModMetaData.description:
Chinese to English translation of @堂丸's "TT-15 Scorpion" Mechanoid. I apologize for any mistranslations as I do not speak Chinese.
If the original author wishes at any time for me to remove this from the workshop, I will comply with their request to do so.
=================================
TRANSLATION OF ORIGINAL MOD PAGE:
Introduction:
*This mod is someone else's order/commission.* The mobile mouse-catching robot sold by Tiandun, a world-renowned artificial intelligence firm, is one of the most advanced pieces of equipment in the field of artificial intelligence.
/// Warning: Please do not use this product in the colony area with rat-mothers, it may lead to a very low probability of accidental injury. ///
————————————————————————————— renew: 2023/04/23 mod released. ————————————————————————————— If you like it and have the ability to support it, you can go to Aifafa Sotangwan and buy me a bottle of Coke Welcome to join the blowing water QQ group: 946658839 —————————————————————————————
